name: Block Sprint (Beta 0.3.4)
description:
Block Sprint is our first game, we used a tutorial by Brackeys on youtube to create the game. https://www.youtube.com/user/Brackeys/featuredThis is our first game but still expect updates, like more levels and more! We will also be working on more games soon.

Patch Notes:                                                                                                                                                                  0.2.3 - added new starting menu, controls menu, setting menu/ added pause button/ removed pressing "esc" key to pause game.                                                                                              0.2.4 - fixed glitch were after quitting to menu while in game pause button wouldn't work when returning to game.                                                                                                                            0.3.4 - added level selection to game, when completing a level the next level will be unlocks on level selection.
